name: Penrose (itch)
description:
Penrose is a 1-month project that my team and I worked on during our time at Full Sail University.  We created a third-person puzzle game using the mechanics of Full Sail's ASCORE character system.  The theme of the game, which was given to us, was "The End is the Beginning."  I hope you enjoy it.

The Team: 

Christian Gutierrez, Javier Martin, and Sergey Mysin
